name: Bubble Bash
description:
Yo what's up. 😁✌🏽

The game is all about shooting lasers to hit colour bubbles  that rotates on a big circle or shuriken with the same laser colour. Yeah it's color matching game . Oh and there's an hp bar that reduces every second. To keep it full you need to burst some bubbles and if you miss you lose a tiny amount of hp. Try to last as long as you can Kay ✌🏽.

This game was mode for kenney jam. So play the game and rate it.

After the jam mobile build would be out  and stuff.

Have fun😁✌🏽.

CONTROLS

Mouse to aim 

Left click or space to shoot lasers 

Tab or right click to change lasers colors

Credits

Art: Kenney (some of them😁)

Music : By someone

Programming: I think this game coded itself 🤷🏽

Hey don't forget to follow me for more epik games and gamedev 

stuff👇🏽
